Class ContextAnnotationBinder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.jaxrs.runtime.ext.bind.ContextAnnotationBinder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type to bind
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedArgumentBinder<javax.ws.rs.core.Context,T,HttpRequest<?>>, ArgumentBinder<T,HttpRequest<?>>, AnnotatedRequestArgumentBinder<javax.ws.rs.core.Context,T>, RequestArgumentBinder<T>

    @Singleton
public class ContextAnnotationBinder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnnotatedRequestArgumentBinder<javax.ws.rs.core.Context,T>
    Handles the JAX-RS Context annotation binding.
